description: The file defines the `NotesProvider` class, a state management class for handling notes, categories, filters, and search functionality within a Flutter app. It interacts with a `NotesRepository` to perform CRUD operations and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class managing the state of notes, categories, filters, and search parameters for a Flutter note-taking application.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider by fetching categories and notes.

methods.name: _refreshCategories
methods.description: Retrieves the list of note categories from the repository.

methods.name: setBottomTab
methods.description: Sets the current bottom tab index, adjusting filter flags and updating notes accordingly.

methods.name: setSearch
methods.description: Updates the search string used to filter notes.

methods.name: setCategoryFilter
methods.description: Filters notes by a specific category.

methods.name: refreshNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes based on current filters and search parameters.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the given title, content, and optional category, then refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: addCategory
methods.description: Adds a new category by name.

methods.name: deleteCategory
methods.description: Deletes a category by its ID.
